Here you will shortly receive information on the registration and implementation of "The AMOS Project - Software Developer Role" in SS 2024.
An general overview on AMOS you can find on
Additional information on this years organisation of the course you can find at:
In the meantime, you can document your INTEREST in participating by enrolling in this course.
Please note that enrollment in this course does not constitute a commitment of a place in the course. We will use this ISIS course to communicate further in preparation for the course.
Due to limited capacity, please refrain from emailing inquiries to the department chair or instructors.
Instead, use the forum in this course. We will answer any questions collectively.
Aktivität Questions for AMOS / Allgemeines Frage-Forum zu AMOS auswählen
Questions for AMOS / Allgemeines Frage-Forum zu AMOS

You can ask your questions about the project here, which we will collect and then answer collectively. Please refrain from asking the same questions on many channels. Therefore, they will not be answered faster.

Sie können hier Ihre Fragen zum Projekt stellen, die wir sammeln und dann gesammelt beantworten werden. Bitte sehen sie davon ab, auf vielen Kanälen die gleichen Fragen zu stellen. Sie werden deshalb nicht schneller beantwortet werden können.
